Agreement to end lockout is timely save for NHL season

Brookfield man attacked by bobcat

Roger Mundell Jr. went into his garage yesterday when the bobcat pounced on him. Mundell, his wife, and his 15-year-old nephew were all injured. (AP, 8:31 a.m.)

Bank of America reaches multi-billion-
dollar settlement with Fannie Mae

The bank settled with Fannie Mae on mortgage loans sold by the bank and its Countrywide unit to the agency ahead of the nation's 2008 financial crisis. (AP, 8:46 a.m.)

The president will nominate Chuck Hagel as his defense secretary and counterterrorism adviser John Brennan to lead the Central Intelligence Agency. (AP, 8:12 a.m.)
